prop.name: HorizontalScroll
prop.p: This property must be assigned in the constructor of the control template, and should not be changed during the life cycle. It is the <HScroll/> control in the control template.

prop.name: VerticalScroll
prop.p: This property must be assigned in the constructor of the control template, and should not be changed during the life cycle. It is the <VScroll/> control in the control template.
